app.name: GBA Link Cable Dumper
app.short_description: Gamecube to GBA Link Cable Dumper
app.long_description:
An updated version of FIX94's GBA Link Cable Dumper. https://github.com/FIX94/gba-link-cable-dumper
The GameCube controller or a synced Wii Remote can be used.
The data gets sent to vbagx so you can send and recieve save data from you GBA to the emulator and be able to play on your wii
